titles.title: Blessing and honour, glory and power
Ancient of days

properties.copyright: Â©1992 Integrity's Hosanna! Music (Admin. by SCM Verlagsgruppe GmbH)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blessing and honour, glory and power
Be unto the Ancient of Days
From every nation, all of creation
Bow before the Ancient of Days

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Every tongue in heaven and earth
Shall declare Your glory
Every knee shall bow at Your throne
In worship
You will be exalted, O God
And Your kingdom shall not pass away
O Ancient of Days

verse.name: e1
verse.lines:
Your kingdom shall reign over all the earth
Sing unto the Ancient of Days
For none shall compare to Your matchless worth
Sing unto the Ancient of Days
